thread.title: US Customer in Colorado
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by US Customer in Colorado

author: US Customer in Colorado
title: US Customer in Colorado
text: Bought some bike clothing. A day or so after I finalized the order it became apparent I need to change the size. I emailed and called prior to the order being shipped and I was successful in changing the size without any issue or additional fees. Package was received as promised.
